trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of data supplied by the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" />.
trans-unit.target: Spécifie le type de données fournies par le <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" />.

trans-unit.source: Represents a dataflow block that is a source of data.
trans-unit.target: Représente un bloc de flux de données qui est une source de données.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> of the message being consumed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> du message en cours d'utilisation.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> consuming the message.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> absorbant le message.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the message was successfully consumed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si le message a été consommé avec succès ; sinon <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Called by a linked <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> to accept and consume a T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader previously offered by this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" />.
trans-unit.target: Appelé par un <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> lié pour accepter et consommer un T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader précédemment proposé par ce <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" />.

trans-unit.source: The value of the consumed message.
trans-unit.target: Valeur du message consommé.

trans-unit.source: This may correspond to a different <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> instance than was previously reserved and passed as the <paramref name="messageHeader" /> to <see cref="M:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1.ConsumeMessage(System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader,System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock{`0},System.Boolean@)" />.
trans-unit.target: Cela peut correspondre à une instance de <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> différente de celle qui a été précédemment réservée et transmise comme <paramref name="messageHeader" /> à <see cref="M:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1.ConsumeMessage(System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader,System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock{`0},System.Boolean@)" />.

trans-unit.source: The consuming <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> must use the returned value instead of the value passed as <paramref name="messageValue" /> through <see cref="M:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1.OfferMessage(System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader,`0,System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock{`0},System.Boolean)" />.
trans-unit.target: Le <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> consommateur doit utiliser la valeur retournée au lieu de la valeur passée comme <paramref name="messageValue" /> via <see cref="M:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1.OfferMessage(System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader,`0,System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock{`0},System.Boolean)" />.

trans-unit.source: If the message requested is not available, the return value will be null.
trans-unit.target: Si le message demandé n’est pas disponible, la valeur de retour est Null.

trans-unit.source: Only <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601> instances linked to this <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601> instance may use <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ConsumeMessage%2A>, and it must only be used to consume <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader> instances previously offered by this source to the target.
trans-unit.target: Uniquement <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601> les instances liées à ce <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601> instance peut utiliser <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ConsumeMessage%2A>, et il doit être utilisé uniquement pour consommer <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader> instances précédemment offert par cette source à la cible.

trans-unit.source: The messageHeader is not valid.
trans-unit.target: Le messageHeader n’est pas valide.

trans-unit.source: The target is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: La cible est <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> to which to connect this source.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> auquel connecter cette source.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowLinkOptions" /> instance that configures the link.
trans-unit.target: Instance <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowLinkOptions" /> qui configure le lien.

trans-unit.source: Links the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" /> to the specified <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" />.
trans-unit.target: Lie le <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" /> au <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> spécifié.

trans-unit.source: An IDisposable that, upon calling Dispose, will unlink the source from the target.
trans-unit.target: IDisposable qui, en appelant Dispose, dissocie la source de la cible.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="target" /> is null (Nothing in Visual Basic) or <paramref name="linkOptions" /> is null (Nothing in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> est Null (Nothing en Visual Basic) ou <paramref name="linkOptions" /> est Null (Nothing en Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> of the reserved message being released.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> du message réservé en cours de libération.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> releasing the message it previously reserved.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> libérant le message précédemment réservé.

trans-unit.source: Called by a linked <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> to release a previously reserved <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> by this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" />.
trans-unit.target: Appelé par un <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> lié pour libérer un <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> précédemment réservé par ce <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" />.

trans-unit.source: Only <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601> instances linked to this <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601> instance may use `ReleaseReservation`, and it must only be used to release <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader> instances previously and successfully reserved by the target.
trans-unit.target: Uniquement <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601> les instances liées à ce <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601> instance peut utiliser `ReleaseReservation`, et il doit être utilisé uniquement pour la version <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader> instances précédemment et a été réservés par la cible.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="messageHeader" /> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="messageHeader" /> n'est pas valide.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="target" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> a la valeur <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="target" /> did not have the message reserved.
trans-unit.target: La <paramref name="target" /> ne contient pas le message réservé.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> of the message being reserved.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> du message en cours de réservation.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> reserving the message.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> réservant le message.

trans-unit.source: Called by a linked <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> to reserve a previously offered <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> by this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" />.
trans-unit.target: Appelé par un <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> lié pour réserver un <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> précédemment proposé par ce <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the message was successfully reserved; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si le message a été réservé avec succès ; sinon <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Only <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601> instances linked to this <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601> instance may use <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ReserveMessage%2A>, and it must only be used to reserve <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader> instances previously offered by this source to the target.
trans-unit.target: Uniquement <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601> les instances liées à ce <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601> instance peut utiliser <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ReserveMessage%2A>, et il doit être utilisé uniquement pour réserver <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader> instances précédemment offert par cette source à la cible.

trans-unit.source: If `true` is returned, the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601> must subsequently call either <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ConsumeMessage%2A> or <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ReleaseReservation%2A> for this message.
trans-unit.target: Si `true` est retourné, le <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601> doit ensuite appeler <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ConsumeMessage%2A> ou <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ReleaseReservation%2A> pour ce message.

trans-unit.source: Failure to do so may result in the source being unable to propagate any further messages to this or other targets.
trans-unit.target: Cela peut entraîner la source de l’impossibilité de se propager de n’importe quel autre message à ce ou d’autres cibles.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ReserveMessage%2A> must not be called while the target is holding any internal locks.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ReserveMessage%2A> ne doit pas être appelée pendant que la cible est maintenant tous les verrous internes.

trans-unit.source: Doing so will violate the lock hierarchy necessary to avoid deadlocks in a dataflow network.
trans-unit.target: Cela violeront la hiérarchie de verrouillage nécessaire pour éviter les blocages dans un réseau de flux de données.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="messageHeader" /> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="messageHeader" /> n'est pas valide.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="target" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> a la valeur <see langword="null" />.
